_sText:
//==================================\\
|| DB_DODGEBALL README
\\==================================//

Dodgeball Arena
-- Author: free(ghost)
-- Date: 03/17/09
-- Version: 1.0 Beta

I noticed a growing population in the dodgeball area of Counter-Strike,
and I had a request to make a professional league arena. So I did and I
figured I could upload it here for anyone who wishes to play some dodgeball
in an indoor-style arena.

Map layout is roughly based off of a basketball court / dodgeball court.

NOTE: This is meant for LEAGUE use... some people may use the stands as a way
to avoid grenades. Since this is beta, I figured I'd let you decide if I should
keep them or not.

Thanks, and enjoy!
-free
